definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: in Judah (place of bread. (food), mod. Ar. bayot lah.m, place of meat), 2 hours south of Jerusalem; birth-place of David;—[[בֵּית לֶ֫חֶם]] Ru 1:19 + 11 t.; [[־לָחֶם]]´[[בּ]] 1Sa 20:6 + 9 t.; [[בֵּית לָָחֶם]] Ju Jdg 12:8 + 11 t. + Ge 35:19, Ge 48:7, where [[הוא בית לחם]] is a gloss, v. [[אֶפְרָ֫תָה]], p. 68; [[־לָָחֶם]] ´[[בּ]] 1Sa 17:15 + 3 t.;—as cstr. [[לֶ֫חֶם]] ´[[בּ]] [[יְהוּדָה]] Ju Jdg 17:7, Jdg 17:8, Jdg 17:9, Jdg 19:1, Jdg 19:2, Jdg 19:18, Jdg 19:18, Ru 1:1, Ru 1:2, 1Sa 17:12; treated as n.pr.m. 1Ch 2:51, 1Ch 2:54, 1Ch 4:4; men of Bethlehem ´[[אַנְשֵׁי בּ]] Ne 7:26 = ´[[בְּנֵי בּ]] Ezr 2:21; —on [[אֶפְרָ֫תָה]] as name of Bethlehem, & confusion arising from gloss Ge 35:19, Ge 48:7, v. p. 68;—mod. Beit Laḥm, 5 m. S. of Jerus. Rob:BR i. 471 Bd:Pal 123 Survey:iii. 28, 83 Guêrin:Judêe i. 120–206.
[[בֵּית לָָחֶם]] in Zeb. Jos 19:15; perh. also Ju Jdg 12:8, Jdg 12:10; = Beit Laḥm, 7 m. NW. of Nazareth Rob:BR iii. 113 Survey:i. 301.
